chunked_vad.lyrics_text: I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you I need you the most I gave you the key when the door wasn't open
I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you I need you the most I gave you the key when the door wasn't open Just admit it
I need you the most I gave you the key when the door wasn't open Just admit it See, I gave you faith, turned your doubt into hoping, can't deny it
I gave you the key when the door wasn't open Just admit it See, I gave you faith, turned your doubt into hoping, can't deny it Now I'm all alone and my joys turned to moping
Just admit it See, I gave you faith, turned your doubt into hoping, can't deny it Now I'm all alone and my joys turned to moping Tell me here, where are you now that I need ya?

See, I gave you faith, turned your doubt into hoping, can't deny it Now I'm all alone and my joys turned to moping Tell me here, where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now? (where are you now?)
Now I'm all alone and my joys turned to moping Tell me here, where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now? (where are you now?) Where are you now that I need ya?
Tell me here, where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now? (where are you now?) Where are you now that I need ya? Couldn't find you anywhere
Where are you now? (where are you now?) Where are you now that I need ya? Couldn't find you anywhere When you broke down I didn't leave ya
Where are you now that I need ya? Couldn't find you anywhere When you broke down I didn't leave ya I was by your side
Couldn't find you anywhere When you broke down I didn't leave ya I was by your side So where are you now that I need ya?
When you broke down I didn't leave ya I was by your side So where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya?
I was by your side So where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya?
So where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya?
Where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya?
Where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya? I gave you attention when nobody else was payin', hm
Where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya? I gave you attention when nobody else was payin', hm I gave you the shirt off my back whatchu sayin'
Where are you now that I need ya? I gave you attention when nobody else was payin', hm I gave you the shirt off my back whatchu sayin' To keep you warm
I gave you attention when nobody else was payin', hm I gave you the shirt off my back whatchu sayin' To keep you warm I showed you the game everybody else was playin', that's for sure
I gave you the shirt off my back whatchu sayin' To keep you warm I showed you the game everybody else was playin', that's for sure And I was on my knees when nobody else was prayin', oh Lord
To keep you warm I showed you the game everybody else was playin', that's for sure And I was on my knees when nobody else was prayin', oh Lord Where are you now that I need ya?
I showed you the game everybody else was playin', that's for sure And I was on my knees when nobody else was prayin', oh Lord Where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya?

And I was on my knees when nobody else was prayin', oh Lord Where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya? I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you, (Where are you now that I need ya?)

Where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya? I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you, (Where are you now that I need ya?) I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you

Where are you now that I need ya? I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you, (Where are you now that I need ya?) I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you I need you the most

I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you, (Where are you now that I need ya?) I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you, I need you I need you the most Where are you now that I need ya?

I need you the most Where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya?
Where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya? I need you the most
Where are you now that I need ya? Where are you now that I need ya? I need you the most I need you the most
Where are you now that I need ya? I need you the most I need you the most I need you the most
